DEFENSE.description: {Block|Blocks} up to {level} Physical Damage and if so, {remove|removes} that much Defense.

POISON.description: {Take|Takes} {level} Poison Damage at the start of {your|the Enemy's} turn.

REGENERATION.description: {Restore|Restores} {level} Health at the start of {your|the Enemy's} turn.

EVASION.description: {evasion_probability} chance to take no damage from an incoming attack.

HIDDEN.description: {crit_probability} chance to deal double damage when {you attack|the Enemy attacks}.

PARALYZE.description: {You|The Enemy} cannot play any cards except Consumables.

FRENZY.description: Cards {you play|the Enemy plays} have none of their effects except dealing damage.

CALM.description: Cards {you play|the Enemy plays} deal no damage.

FORTIFY_AGILITY.description: {Increase your|Increases the Enemy's} maximum Stamina by {level}.

DAMAGE_AGILITY.description: {Decrease your|Descreases the Enemy's} maximum Stamina by {level}.

FORTIFY_INTELLIGENCE.description: {Increase your|Increases the Enemy's} your maximum Magicka by {level}.

DAMAGE_INTELLIGENCE.description: {Decrease your|Descreases the Enemy's} your maximum Magicka by {level}.

FORTIFY_STRENGTH.description: Weapons {you play|the Enemy plays} deal {percent_change} more damage.

DAMAGE_STRENGTH.description: Weapons {you play|the Enemy plays} deal {percent_change} less damage.

FORTIFY_ENDURANCE.description: Armor {you play|the Enemy plays} provides {percent_change} more Defense.

DAMAGE_ENDURANCE.description: Armor {you play|the Enemy plays} provides {percent_change} less Defense.

FORTIFY_WILLPOWER.description: Spells {you play|the Enemy plays} deal {percent_change} more damage.

DAMAGE_WILLPOWER.description: Spells {you play|the Enemy plays} deal {percent_change} less damage.

FORTIFY_SPEED.description: {Draw|Draws} {level} more cards at the start of {your|the Enemy's} turn.

DAMAGE_SPEED.description: {Draw|Draws} {level} fewer cards at the start of {your|the Enemy's} turn.

FORTIFY_LONG_BLADE.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Long Blades cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_BLUNT_WEAPON.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Blunt Weapons cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_SHORT_BLADE.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Short Blades cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_MARKSMAN.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Marksman Weapons cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_LIGHT_ARMOR.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Light Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_MEDIUM_ARMOR.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Medium Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_HEAVY_ARMOR.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Heavy Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_ALTERATION.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Alteration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_CONJURATION.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Conjuration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_DESTRUCTION.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Destruction Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_ILLUSION.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Illusion Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_MYSTICISM.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Mysticism Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_RESTORATION.description: {Your|The Enemy's} Restoration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

REFLECT.description: {Block|Blocks} up to {level} non-Physical damage, and if so, {deal|deals} that much damage to the attacker.

SPELL_ABSORPTION.description: {Block|Blocks} up to {level} non-Physical damage, and if so, {gain|gains} that many points of Fortify Intelligence.

DISEASE.description: {You|The Enemy} cannot play more than 4 cards per turn.

BLIGHT.description: {You|The Enemy} cannot play more than 2 cards per turn.

LEVITATE.description: {Average|Averages} the costs of the cards in {your|the Enemy's} hand.

SLOWFALLING.description: {You|The Enemy} no longer {discard your|discards their} remaining cards at the end of {your|their} turn.

WATER_WALKING.description: Cards {you play|the Enemy plays} that would go to the Discard Pile go on top of {your|their} Deck instead.

SWIFT_SWIM.description: When {you draw your|the Enemy draws their} hand, {you|they} may discard up to {level} cards then draw that many cards.

WATER_BREATHING.description: When {you|the Enemy} would draw {your|their} hand, instead {select|selects} up to {level} cards from {your|their} Discard Pile to add to {your|their} hand. Then {draw|draws} the rest of {your|their} cards.
